errors.message: Consecutive 'Authenticate via Kerberos' capabilities are not supported
errors.recommendation: Avoid placing multiple 'Authenticate via Kerberos' nodes back-to-back in the flow. This capability uses a one-time-use token that will fail if reused. Separate these nodes with non-authentication logic or remove the redundant instance.
